system.description:
• Change Appearance (+3): As an action, changelings can alter physical features to appear as another humanoid form up to one @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.JournalEntry.swadecor06bestia.JournalEntryPage.06specialabili25#size]{Size} larger or smaller but cannot alter their clothing or gear. This ability does not have a limited duration. The change of appearance grants changelings a +4 to @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Item.UVdSzNvdAPmGk0iO]{Performance} rolls when attempting to impersonate another individual they’ve observed. If killed, they automatically return to their natural form.

  • Changeling Instincts (+2): Changelings are socially and psychologically intuitive due to their adoption and understanding of different personas. They add +1 to @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Item.TlMOxNi4U4YOnHId]{Intimidation} and @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Item.k7fIVOghEx6y44xE]{Persuasion} rolls.

  • Outsider (−1): Changelings have the @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-hindrances.Item.IQgZkCUMklDKYV9x]{Outsider} (Minor) Hindrance. If identified as a changeling, they have −1 to @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-skills.Item.k7fIVOghEx6y44xE]{Persuasion} as other races tend to distrust them, but their changeling instincts still give them some advantage.

Changelings have the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-hindrances.IQgZkCUMklDKYV9x]{Outsider} (Minor) Hindrance. If identified as a changeling, they have −1 to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.k7fIVOghEx6y44xE]{Persuasion} as other races tend to distrust them, but their changeling instincts still give them some advantage.
